forum.name: tips for newbies
forum.description: just started anyland? confused about what to do? these are the things i learned that i think everyone should know!
forum.latestCommentText: here is an object that you can place into your area that explains how lighting works in a nice visual aid.

thread.title: setting up your world for building.

comments.text: when you first start anyland, you can generally only create objects or build in areas that you have created (or the area that has been created automatically for you when you start)
if you are anything like me, one of the first things you'll want you do is get the lighting right so that you can see properly. luckily, this is actually fairly easy!
here is an object you can place into your world (just grab it from the right of this comment and drag it to where you can see it, and make sure you are in your own area) that will
here is an object that you can place into your area that explains how lighting works in a nice visual aid.
